name: LYDIA: SWEET DREAMS
description: LYDIA: SWEET DREAMS is a fast paced, intense reflex game, which challenges players to survive and defeat waves of enemies in its vibrantly colorful world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.0 GHz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 support and needs a directX 10 capable video card. Storage: 200 MB available space
